body: I have been removed as a guildmaster for some time now without noticing. Reddit has this already, lets go above them!

title: Can we get a notification/message when you get removed as a guildmaster?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: This is probably far-fetched, but I hope my posts about the "admin assistant" discord mods didn't make them think you're bad news. I've repeatedly stated that all the current mods are good people and the system is just flawed right now due to admin oversights, but some people jump the conclusion that anyone who says anything remotely positive about any mod is shilling for them.
body_html: This is probably far-fetched, but I hope my posts about the "admin assistant" discord mods didn't make them think you're bad news. I've repeatedly stated that all the current mods are good people and the system is just flawed right now due to admin oversights, but some people jump the conclusion that anyone who says anything remotely positive about any mod is shilling for them.

body: i don't think you did anything wrong but i dont think im liked generally, partially because of my views and because that's a crushing feeling on almost everywhere i go and has lead to some life issues, but thats for something else
